author: cperezz.eth
content:
Tried the Hosted Test interface [here](https://ceremony.ethereum.org/) and I've been re-directed 4 times when trying to LogIn with Ethereum by signing the required messages.
Not sure if that is the expected behaviour, but the app finally seems to be stucked at https://ceremony.ethereum.org/#/double_sign

content:

    l doubleSign.tsx:148
```

author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> which wallets are you using and are you using the same account for the sign-in phase and binding phase?

content: Same one for both. Maybe I missed reading something and need to be different??

content: I signed through SIWE and used Metamask to sign the messages as Web3Provider
